content: Thank you Robert! It’s critical to understand their abilities to manage disruptive innovation. If they’re able to manage it, they can start with deployment of (Trello’s) Autonomous Business Unit. This type of integration can be done quit fast (it takes up 1 to 2 years). And less risky for both companies. But my view is already described in this post. “If integration happens, it’s the beginning of the end.”!
